name: Tarnation
description:
Ten track CD album on Future Noise Recordings.

Recorded at Full Stack Studio (Arkham Witch, The Lamp of Thoth, Black Magician) and mastered by James Plotkin (Khanate, OLD, Earth, Isis, Pelican). The art and design has been handled by Sean Schock (Yob, Buzzoven, Sourvein, Spirit Caravan, Brothers of the Sonic Cloth, Coffins).

CD is in a 4 panel digipack with lyric booklet.

01. Drug Monarch
02. A Punch in the Fucking Lungs
03. (Roasted in the Depths of the) Sloar
04. Bastard Sabbath
05. Tarnation
06. Repugnance
07. Bookatee Willalee
08. Locklear
09. Snapmare
10. What Are You Looking at Dicknose?

£7.00 with UK shipping.
£8.50 non UK shipping.

name: Bastard of the Skies/ Catatomic Split LP
description:
Five Bastard of the Skies tracks (including a Neil Young cover) and two Catatomic tracks...

Heavy 180g vinyl. Includes insert and CDR copy.
Mastered by James Plotkin.

Tracklist:

Bastard of the Skies

1. Willalee Bookatee
2. The Knuckles of Saint Bronson
3. Grays Sports Almanac
4. Human Skull
5. Don't Let it Bring You Down

Catatomic

1. Void
2. I Went to You

name: Ichor! Ichor!
description:
CD album on Mother Should Know Records. Nine tracks of filthy sludge goodness. 

"...a timeless, musical benchmark for Sludge Metal bands everywhere. Listen to Bastard Of The Skies people and hear how its done. Pulverizing goodness."  Earthdog Promotions

"...a total fucking MONSTER of a record. A YUUUUGE, betentacled colossus of a monster."  The Sleeping Shaman

Tracklist:

1. Just A Horse
2. Can You Fly Bobby?
3. (Tree Of) Woe
4. A Legendary Temper
5. Evensong
6. Lariat
7. Splendour! Splendour!
8. Skies Of The Bastard
9. Debbie Rochon (special, secret, bonus track)

£6.00 with UK shipping. 
£7.50 non UK shipping.

name: S/T album
description:
Self titled 2008 debut album on Meltdown Records. Nine tracks. Limited numbers.

“Awesome - the soundtrack to drowning in a swamp full of your own shite.” Zero Tolerance
 
“...they mercilessly beat the listener into submission...expect great things from these brutes” - Rocksound

“...the wall of noise that these guys create is truly something to behold” - Hellride Music

Tracklist:

1. Deputy Lou Ford
2. But Our Princess Is In Another Castle
3. (18 And A Half Stone) Parts Unknown
4. You, Foe
5. A Traitor In The Herd
6. Michael Fucking Dudikoff
7. Shitfire
8. Cowards! Cowards!
9. Kubrick Zirconia

£6.00 with UK shipping.
£7.50 non UK shipping.

name: Remains - Cassette (inc download)
description:
Five track cassette EP. 
Recorded at the same time as "Ichor! Ichor!"
Filthy, doomy, sludgy, lovely...

Slime green coloured cassette and case. Because that matters.

Includes high quality download in format of your choice.

Limited!

Tracklist:

1. Boss Snake
2. Kaolin
3. Ichor! Ichor!
4. Trails
5. By The Power Of Magic...WRITHE!

£3.00 with uk postage.
£3.50 with non uk postage.
